name: Gilles de Rais, the Golden Dragon
text: Flying Swiftness (This card can attack and activate its ability in a turn it comes into a field.) Continuous: This card gains [+200/+0] for each of your fire magic stone. Continuous: When this card is destroyed, you may banish three of your fire magic stones. If you do, put this card from its owner's graveyard into its owner's field.
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
